ip.bk: Paul's letter to the believers in Rome

ip: was sent to both Jews and non-Jews who believe in, and trust, Yeshua the messiah. He wrote to them so that they could be prepared for when he could visit them there. Paul planned to work there with other Christians for a while, then with their help, he would travel to Spain. He wrote in order to explain his understanding of Christian faith and of day-to-day living as Christians.
